import React from 'react' const Checkout = ({ order, user }) => { const { items, shipping_charge, discount_in_percent, shipping_address, totalCost, totalItems } = order; return (

Checkout

{items.length}

  • Total
    ${totalCost}
  • Items
    {totalItems}
  • Shipping Charges
    ${shipping_charge}
  • Discount({discount_in_percent}%)
    -{totalCost * discount_in_percent / 100}
  • Total (USD) ${totalCost - totalCost * discount_in_percent / 100 + shipping_charge}

) } export default Checkout
